tournament.name: Spotlight Liverpool: Sunday Destination Qualifier -  Fanfinity

decks.notes: The deck focuses on playing aggressively and disrupting the opponent's game plan by using creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Quantum Riddler. It also includes cards like Solitude and Consign to Memory to control the board and handle threats efficiently. The key concept revolves around putting pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their strategy through a combination of aggressive creatures, removal spells, and disruptive cards like Teferi, Time Raveler. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy while providing the necessary color requirements for the spells.

The deck focuses on assembling the powerful combo of Amulet of Vigor and Primeval Titan to quickly ramp up mana and search for key land cards like Urza's Saga and Gruul Turf. It includes cards like Arboreal Grazer and Aftermath Analyst to help accelerate mana production and support the combo. The goal is to efficiently search for and play powerful land cards while maintaining a strong board presence through summoning impactful creatures like Primeval Titan. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a well-timed combination of land plays and creature summons.

The deck focuses on a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing powerful creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Goblin Bombardment, Blood Moon, and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes utility lands like Arena of Glory and Elegant Parlor. Overall, the Boros Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats and burn spells while using disruptive elements to control the game.

The main concept of this deck is to win through using a combo strategy without relying on lands. This is achieved by using cards like Goblin Charbelcher and Lotus Bloom to generate mana, while utilizing cards like Disrupting Shoal and Suppression Ray to disrupt the opponent's strategies. The deck also includes powerful cards like Thundertrap Trainer and Whir of Invention to combo off and win the game. Overall, the deck focuses on creating a fast and efficient win condition through a landless combo strategy.

The deck focuses on playing artifact creatures and utilizing artifacts to generate mana and control the board. It aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Pithing Needle and Portable Hole. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga provide additional value and card advantage, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student can help dig for key cards. The deck's main strategy revolves around efficiently putting pressure on the opponent while having control elements in place to handle threats and disrupt their strategy.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The deck focuses on using efficient creatures like Guide of Souls and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, along with powerful spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal damage quickly. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and other support cards like Seasoned Pyromancer provide additional value and options for the player. The deck also includes utility lands like Arena of Glory and Elegant Parlor to further enhance its aggressive gameplay.

This aggro Merfolk deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with creatures like Floodpits Drowner, Harbinger of the Seas, and Lord of Atlantis, while using Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play. The deck also includes disruption spells like Force of Negation and Sink into Stupor to control the game. The use of Tide Shaper and Vodalian Hexcatcher helps to manipulate the battlefield, while Silvergill Adept provides card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and control elements, supported by lands like Mutavault and Cavern of Souls.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and utilizing artifact synergy to overwhelm the opponent with big threats early on. It also utilizes cards like Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke to control the board and protect its key pieces. The deck has a high emphasis on card draw with cards like Mishra's Bauble and Thoughtcast to maintain its aggressive tempo. Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for key artifacts, while Tormod's Crypt helps disrupt graveyard strategies. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, aggressive, and resilient in the Modern format.

The deck focuses on using powerful Eldrazi creatures in combination with various support cards to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By generating mana with Eldrazi Temple and other lands, the deck aims to cast Emrakul, the Promised End and other high-cost threats early in the game. Cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble provide removal and disruption, while Urza's Saga helps in finding key artifacts. The goal is to establish a strong board presence and control the game through powerful creatures and spells.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of disruptive spells and removal, while also being able to generate card advantage and tempo with cards like Preordain and Murktide Regent. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation, while also being able to pressure them with efficient threats like Psychic Frog and Quantum Riddler. The deck aims to grind out a win by out-valuing the opponent and controlling the board with a mix of counter magic and removal spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to quickly put pressure on the opponent. Support cards like Solitude and Consign to Memory help control the board while also providing additional value. Quantum Riddler and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide card advantage and disruptive effects. Teferi, Time Raveler is used to protect the board and prevent the opponent from interacting during key turns. The mana base includes versatile lands like Arid Mesa and Flooded Strand to ensure consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the deck's spells.

The deck focuses on aggressively disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures to quickly close out the game. By utilizing cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Quantum Riddler to disrupt the opponent's resources, alongside efficient beaters like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Solitude, the deck aims to control the board and close out the game before the opponent can stabilize. Key cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Consign to Memory provide additional disruption and card advantage, while the mana base allows for consistent casting of powerful spells.

The main concept of this Aggro - Affinity deck is to quickly flood the board with cheap artifact creatures like Memnite and Kappa Cannoneer, while utilizing cards like Mox Opal and Urza's Saga to generate mana and search for key artifacts. Engineered Explosives and Metallic Rebuke provide disruption and control, while Mishra's Bauble and Thoughtcast help with card draw. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of early aggression and efficient artifact synergy, supported by utility cards like Tormod's Crypt and Pithing Needle for additional versatility.

This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana using spells like Desperate Ritual and Pyretic Ritual, along with Ruby Medallion to cast multiple spells in a turn. The goal is to chain together spells to generate a storm count and then finish off the opponent with a powerful spell like Past in Flames or Glimpse the Impossible. Ral, Monsoon Mage serves as a key combo piece by untapping lands and allowing for additional spells to be cast in a turn. The deck also includes Wish cards to tutor for specific combo pieces and close out the game.

The focus of this Ruby Storm deck is to quickly generate mana and cast multiple spells in a single turn to create a storm count that can win the game in a single explosive turn. The deck includes cards that reduce the cost of spells, generate additional mana, and provide card draw to enable the player to chain multiple spells together. The deck aims to utilize cards like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames to generate large amounts of mana and cast powerful spells like Wish to win the game in a single turn.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing powerful Eldrazi creatures and spells, with the ultimate goal of assembling the UrzaTron lands to generate large amounts of mana. By using cards like Expedition Map to find the necessary lands and Kozilek's Command to disrupt the opponent's strategy, the deck aims to dominate the battlefield with threats like Thought-Knot Seer and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms. Additionally, Karn, the Great Creator provides versatile options for dealing with various situations, making it a versatile and adaptable control archetype.
